name: Aita
description:
Aita is a roguelite dark fantasy in 3D where you control Fathos, an ancient etruscan warrior banished in the Limbo, land infested by souls.

In order to survive, Fathos has to slain hordes of enemies with his enchanted weapons, Hinoal and Flerxia, haunted by Aita, the death God. But that's not all: a thirsty demon will make a deal with you.

Experience a fast-paced combat, where positioning and dashes will determine your victory and ascend the mortal life.

CONTROLS:

  • Movement = WASD
  • Light Attack = Left click
  • Heavy Attack = Right click
  • Dash = Space bar
  • Active ability = F
  • Pause = E
